title: (x) Stencil fonts - various {gang}
content:
Hi friends im looking for Very good samples of Stencils Fonts, if somebody can tell me the names of fonts.Actually im doing a screenprinting job.

Thank you

Miguel Hernando

 [‹ smirnoff](http://web.archive.org/web/20080825143229/http:/www.typophile.com/node/13368 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) hand printed script - Litterbox {Ryan} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080825143229/http:/www.typophile.com/node/13380 "Go to next forum topic")
author: hernando

comments.content: Are you looking for a typeface to use? Are you hinting around at something which is free or at least an unrestricted EULA?
Im looking for a typeface to use, Anithing free or not

typeco has some that are quite industrial and techno  
 [http://www.typeco.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080825143229/http:/www.typeco.com/ "http://www.typeco.com")

house industries has, in their general collection, housebroken. house also has a stencil font in their sampler.

[http://www.houseind.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080825143229/http:/www.houseind.com/ "http://www.houseind.com/")

’ [Bunker](http://web.archive.org/web/20080825143229/http:/www.omine.net/bunker.htm)’_, by fellow Typophile Eduardo Omine.._  
’ [Jigsaw](http://web.archive.org/web/20080825143229/http:/www.typotheque.com/site/font_info.php?family_id=7&id=37)’ _( Stencil ), by Johanna Balušíková / Typotheque.._  
’ [Konstrukt](http://web.archive.org/web/20080825143229/http:/www.stereotypehaus.com/catalog/product_info.php/cPath/23/products_id/31)’_, by R D Granados / Stereo Type Haus.._  
’ [Looper](http://web.archive.org/web/20080825143229/http:/www.secretonix.pt/ftf/catalogue/BSlooper.htm)’_, by Mário Feliciano.._

’ [stencilFONTS](http://web.archive.org/web/20080825143229/http:/www.apply.de/english/typefaces/stencilFONTS/info.html)’ _( Collection, 40 Fonts, on CD ), from Apply.._

_Nice, Legal, Free, Alternates.:_ ’ [United Stencil](http://web.archive.org/web/20080825143229/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=freefonts)’_, from House Industries, and,_ ’ [DIN SchablonierSchrift](http://web.archive.org/web/20080825143229/http:/www.sendung.de/dinschablonierschrift/)’_, by Marian Steinbach.._

Check out Le Corbusier, Container, Chernobyl and Watertower from Lineto:

[http://www.lineto.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080825143229/http:/www.lineto.com/ "http://www.lineto.com/")
